about.title: From Student to Web Engineer
about.description: A recent graduate with a degree in web engineering, equipped with a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies.

about.beyondCodeDescription: Beyond coding, my interests fuel my creativity and problem-solving skills.

contact.title: Let's Build Together
contact.heading: Ready to Contribute to Your Company
contact.description: I’m eager to bring my skills to an ambitious and innovative company. Let’s discuss how I can help support your projects and goals.
contact.personalStatement: Driven by innovation and efficiency, I bring a dynamic and creative perspective to enhance your company’s success.

testimonials.title: What My Mentors Say
testimonials.description: Here’s what my professors and mentors have to say about my skills and performance during my studies.

testimonial1.name: Ana Stanko
testimonial1.text: We spent three years together at L'Atelier de La Plateforme. Tchessi is a kind and cheerful person who integrates easily into any project team. During his apprenticeship at the Atelier, he showed remarkable growth in his skills. He is highly committed to the projects entrusted to him and actively contributes to the daily life of the team. We are delighted to have shared part of his professional journey.

testimonial2.name: Morad Labrid
testimonial2.position: Lead Developer Full Stack @ L'Atelier de La Plateforme
testimonial2.text: I had the pleasure of working with Tchessi during his apprenticeship. Serious, curious, and committed, he quickly stood out for his skills in front-end development while being equally comfortable with back-end tasks. Always ready to learn and help the team, he brought real value to our projects. A well-rounded, motivated, and promising individual whom I highly recommend. Wishing you all the best, Tchessi!

testimonial3.name: Marc BERGE
testimonial3.position: Creator and Coach at MMD Coaching & Performance @MMD Coaching
testimonial3.text: I had the pleasure of coaching Tchèssi as a professional coach. This coaching was conducted as part of the training programs offered by the online training organization OPENCLASSROOMS, where Tchèssi trained for the profession of Web Developer and obtained his diploma. Throughout our collaboration, Tchèssi was highly motivated and rigorous in his journey, both in completing the projects and in building his future professional career. He demonstrated great dynamism in successfully carrying out his new professional project. I am certain that his new skills, combined with his numerous and rich previous professional experiences, will make him an effective and sought-after collaborator.

testimonial4.name: Joris VERGULDEZOONE
testimonial4.text: I had the pleasure of working with Tchéssi for two years as his instructor. He is a motivated and disciplined developer who stays up to date with the latest packages and technologies.I appreciate his positive energy — he was a driving force within his class, especially during group projects, including inter-cohort collaborations. He’s also a great team player, always ready to share and contribute to a strong, friendly group dynamic.I confidently recommend him for the next steps in his academic or professional journey.

testimonial5.name: Michael Johnson
testimonial5.text: Tchèssi's adaptability and willingness to take on new challenges were evident during his internship. He would be an asset to any team looking for fresh talent with a strong foundational knowledge.
